item.title: Talks
item.description: Your can find most of our past talks, and much more, on our Youtube Channel Upcoming talks Pierre Gentine - The Artificial Intelligence for Good Group - Can Artificial Intelligence Help Us Better Project Climate Change? on May 4th Register Laure Zanna will be giving a joing plenary talk with Galen McKinley on M²LInES and LEAP on June 13th at the 2022 CESM Workshop. Info and registration at this website
